title.rendered: EEUU.-Los demócratas de EEUU publican correos de Epstein en los que afirma que Trump "pasó horas" con una de la víctimas

caption.rendered:
18/07/2025 18 July 2025, US, Washington: The Words " President Trump: Release All the Epstein files" is projected on a building, during a projection protest near the White House. Photo: Andrew Leyden/ZUMA Press Wire/dpa

title.rendered: Public service workers protest in France

caption.rendered: Paris (France), 05/12/2024.- Protesters of the CGT labor union walk during a demonstration in defense of civil servants and quality of public services in Paris, France, 05 December 2024. French unions representing public service workers called for a national day of strikes and protests on 05 December 2024. (Protestas, Francia) EFE/EPA/YOAN VALAT

image_meta.caption: Paris (France), 05/12/2024.- Protesters of the CGT labor union walk during a demonstration in defense of civil servants and quality of public services in Paris, France, 05 December 2024. French unions representing public service workers called for a national day of strikes and protests on 05 December 2024. (Protestas, Francia) EFE/EPA/YOAN VALAT
image_meta.title: Public service workers protest in France

caption.rendered: El plan asegura recursos hasta el 30 de enero y permitirá reabrir las agencias federales. Foto: Agencias.
Esta nueva fase contempla la movilización de medios terrestres, aéreos, navales, fluviales y misilísticos, junto a unidades militares, la Milicia y los órganos de seguridad ciudadana. Foto: Archivo.
"Se remite al Ejecutivo nacional a los fines de su promulgación", declaró el presidente de la AN, Jorge Rodríguez. Foto: AN.
